critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing a labor dispute. It expresses a sense of urgency and determination to resolve the issue to avoid disruption of essential transportation services. There is no display of Joy. There is a hint of Sadness that the dispute has reached this point. There is no Anger. There is a hint of Fear that the dispute could disrupt interstate commerce. There is no Disgust. There is a hint of Surprise that the dispute has reached this point.
